data.name: Manacircle
data.detailed_description:
Description:

Welcome to Manacircle. This game is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and solving the problem in a way.


Our heroine "Clair" is trying to find the representative of Costoria with her new mysterious partner "Player".

But when she takes a step into the deep unknown. new faces and new troubles on the way and she needs to solve the problem in a way that only she can do.

The journey to find the true meaning of Manacircle has begun!

Features:

  • The world is formed with colorful retro style pixel art design and classic 8-bit music.
  • Unique and Interesting Battle system.
  • Unique and lovely characters and strong enemies!
  • Comedic, action-packed and touching story!
  • Go on an adventure! Test your skills! Find items and make yourself stronger!

Controls:


W,A,S,D = Movement
Q = Back / Parry(combat)
Space = Interact / Attack(combat)
E = Inventory



((Warning : Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition, careful.))

data.short_description: Manacircle is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and discover a new world. Unique characters and strong enemies will test your skill. The journey to find the true meaning of Manacircle has begun!
